Class DatabaseHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • DatabaseHandler

  • public class DatabaseHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides functions for easier use of SQL commands.
    Author:
    David Eriksson, Fredrik Lindahl

    • Method Detail

      • createAccount

        public static boolean createAccount(java.lang.String username,
                                    java.lang.String password,
                                    java.lang.String hwid)
        Creates an account with the specified credentials.
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the new account.
        password - The password of the new account.
        hwid - The hardware id of the new account.
        Returns:
        Boolean if the specified credentials doesn't already exist.

      • getMaps

        public static javafx.util.Pair<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String>[] getMaps()
        Gets all the maps which are located in the database.
        Returns:
        A pair list containing pairs of map id and map name.

      • getNameFromHWID

        public static java.lang.String getNameFromHWID(java.lang.String hwid)
        Gets the name from a provided hardware id.
        Parameters:
        hwid - The hardware id which the name is to be checked.
        Returns:
        The name of the account which had the specified hardware id.

      • loadMap

        public static MapData loadMap(int id)
        Fetches the mapdata located on the database.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the map which is to be fetched.
        Returns:
        MapData containing the map which is fetched.

      • loginAccount

        public static boolean loginAccount(java.lang.String username,
                                   java.lang.String password,
                                   java.lang.String hwid)
        Checks if the specified user credentials is valid.
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the specified account.
        password - The password of the specified account.
        hwid - The hardware id of the specified account.
        Returns:
        Boolean which if the provided credentials are valid.

      • saveMap

        public static boolean saveMap(org.json.JSONObject j)
        Saves a new map onto the database.
        Parameters:
        j - A JSONObject which contains data regarding the new map.
        Returns:
        A boolean if the map was successfully saved.

      • updateHwid

        public static void updateHwid(java.lang.String username,
                              java.lang.String hwid)
        Updates the current hardware id of a specified user.
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the specified account.
        hwid - The new hardware id which the specified account will be changed to.
